Sentencas: Direct internal dry reforming is a promising way for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) to directly use hydrocarbon fuels, since biogas already contains carbon dioxide and methane, which are both greenhouse gas contributing to global warming.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics and carbon tolerance of solid oxide fuel cells with direct internal dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: In this paper, detailed experimental investigation and thermodynamic calculation were carried out to investigate the influence of CO2 addition on fuel cell's electrochemical characteristics and stability using CO2 to CH4 ratio ranging from 0 to 3.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics and carbon tolerance of solid oxide fuel cells with direct internal dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: The maximum power densities were obtained at CO2 to CH4 ratios of 1.5 and 1.7 for fuel gas mixture with and without N-2 carrier gas, respectively.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics and carbon tolerance of solid oxide fuel cells with direct internal dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: These two values are very close to thermodynamic calculation results about non-carbon limit.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics and carbon tolerance of solid oxide fuel cells with direct internal dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: An analysis of distribution of relaxation time (DRT) for SOFC operated under dry reforming gas mixtures was first proposed in this study.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics and carbon tolerance of solid oxide fuel cells with direct internal dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: The results show that the addition of CO2 can significantly reduce both the anode activation polarization and the fuel gas diffusion resistance at low CO2 to CH4 ratio, while the influence became weaker at higher CO2 to CH4 ratio.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics and carbon tolerance of solid oxide fuel cells with direct internal dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: An additional peak, with a larger relaxation time of 10(-1)similar to 10(1) s, was observed with dry reforming gas mixtures.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics and carbon tolerance of solid oxide fuel cells with direct internal dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: This process, related to dry reforming reaction and water-gas shift reaction, was also influenced by the addition of CO2.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics and carbon tolerance of solid oxide fuel cells with direct internal dry reforming of methane

Sentencas: Besides, we observed an improvement of fuel cell performance by adding appropriate N-2 carrier gas to fuel gas, which may provide a new way to enhance the performance and durability of biogas-fueled SOFC.
Titulo: Electrochemical characteristics and carbon tolerance of solid oxide fuel cells with direct internal dry reforming of methane
